name: Softprodigy
overview:
Soft Prodigy System Solutions (P) Ltd is an ISO 9001:2000 certified global organization with expertise in iPhone application development services. We have over 100 highly-qualified, top-notch iPhone software programming professionals on board. At Soft Prodigy, we have been creating applications, utilities and games for the Apple iPhone and Apple iPad.

The categories of applications that we have been handling are:

OCR Scanning Apps
Facebook Applications
Mobile Html5 Apps
Magazines Apps
Newstand Apps
Mobile brokerage Apps
Location Based Apps
Shopping Apps
Entertainment Apps
Mobile News Apps
Calculations Apps
Games Apps
Travel Apps
Social networking
Search Tools Apps
Weather Apps
Mobile Utilities Apps

our team excels in all the latest technologies like Core Imaging, AppleScript, Core Video, Core Audio, Core Animation, Core Graphics, Cocoa/Objective C, OpenGL, etc. especially for MAC. Committed to quality, flair and design and bring you the very best of iPhone Software Programming.

Along with excellence in SOAP XML/RBC and JSON Web Services and other techniques and technologies, we bring you the best of universal application and app portability. We help you take the benefit of alternative revenue source or app pricing strategy e.g. price schedule in app store, ads, LinkShare/affiliates in a way that maximizes your profits. Call us toll free 866.235.9128 !
